content: ***hopscotch bauble pattern*** this pattern is available for free on my blog or purchase the ad-free printer friendly pdf for a small fee free crochet pattern published on my blog coming saturday 12/16/23 to the blog ✦ quick and cute christmas bauble crochet pattern ✦ make a festive christmas tree ornament ✦ hopscotch baubles make a fun holiday gift ✦ decorate for the holidays with this gorgeous ornament ✦ quick pattern is great for teacher and hostess gifts --> this is an intermediate crochet pattern with a couple of advanced stitches and photo tutorials included --> learn to create crossed double_crochet and extended single_crochet with photo tutorials click here to join my vip facebook community for exclusive discounts cals giveaways and more --> **join the fb group ** 1 **what is included ** 6 page pdf pattern in us english with american crochet terms your pattern is available to download from your ravelry purchases and an email will be sent with a download link as well **size ** approx 9 5 around **materials ** 40 - 50 yds worsted/aran 4 yarn h/8 5 0 mm hook 67-70 mm plastic ornament yarn needle scissors **stitch key ** slip_stitch - slip_stitch double_crochet - double_crochet esc - extended single_crochet esc2tog - decrease by esc 2 sts together xdc - crossed double_crochet ***green fox farms designs original crochet pattern *** i am here to help if you have any questions feel free to send me a message through my blog or social media fb & ig links below this pattern has been thoroughly tested and tech edited this pattern is my intellectual property you are welcome to make as many as you like sell them give them away etc you may not sell or alter and claim as your own this pattern this pattern may not be mass produced it is for individual use only you may not use my photographs if you want to share this pattern online you must only share a link to my blog you may not copy and paste my text / the pattern to another site thank you for respecting my work thank you lisa fox **my website and blog with other *free* patterns ** www greenfoxfarmsdesigns com/ find me on etsy https //www etsy com/shop/greenfoxfarms follow me i share updates photos and occasional giveaways and sales on my social media pages come join the fun https //www instagram com/greenfoxfarms/ https //www facebook com/greenfoxfarms/ 1 https //www facebook com/greenfoxfarmsdesings
